author: jimmygchen
content:
We've been working hard on fixing the bugs found (thanks all for reporting some of theseüôè )
- `DataColumnsByRange` serving more than requested columns: this is a recently introduced bug from an optimisation and we have a fix, we expect the PR to be merged in the next few hours
- `lighthouse-geth-2` stuck issue: we've found cause of this, and it's triggered in long enough period of non finality, working on a fix also
- Lighthouse sometimes not serving all columns due to a race condition. We're working on a fix, hopefully have it merged in the next day
- Insufficient custody peer issue from `devnet-4`: we have a PR and iterating on a fix
- Slow/stuck range sync: making good progress with the new approach and will have a PR today, hopefully merged before end of week
